verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1588>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G1588>chosen<s%> <S%G2532>ones,<s%> and the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> <S%G1588>of<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is according to <S%G2150>godliness,<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5319><s%> in his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G5319>revealed<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2782>message<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> was <S%G4100>entrusted<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G2003>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4990>Savior;<s%>

to <S%G5103>Titus,<s%> my <S%G1103>true<s%> <S%G5043>child<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to a <S%G2839>common<s%> <S%G4102>faith:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace,<s%> <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> and <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4990>Savior.<s%>

<S%G2641>I<s%> left <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2914>Crete<s%> for <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2443>reason,<s%> that <S%G4571>you<s%> would set in <S%G1930>order<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> that were <S%G2532>lacking,<s%> and <S%G2525>appoint<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G1473>in<s%> <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1299>directed<s%> <S%G4671>you;<s%>

<S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G410>blameless,<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> who <S%G4103>believe,<s%> who are <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2724>accused<s%> of <S%G810>loose<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> unruly <S%G506>behavior.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G1985>overseer<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G410>blameless,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G3623>steward;<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G829>self-pleasing,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> easily <S%G3711>angered,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> given to <S%G3943>wine,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4131>violent,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> greedy for dishonest <S%G146>gain;<s%>
<S%G235>but<s%> given to <S%G5382>hospitality,<s%> a lover of <S%G5358>good,<s%> <S%G4998>sober<s%> <S%G1342>minded,<s%> fair, <S%G3741>holy,<s%> <S%G1468>self-controlled;<s%>

<S%G472>holding<s%> to the <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2596>which<s%> is according to the <S%G1322>teaching,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G1415>able<s%> <S%G2532>to<s%> <S%G3870>exhort<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1651>convict<s%> those who contradict <S%G483>him.<s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G3141>testimony<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G227>true.<s%> For this <S%G1223>cause,<s%> <S%G1651>reprove<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G664>sharply,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they may be <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G156>faith,<s%>

<S%G3361>not<s%> paying attention <S%G4337>to<s%> <S%G2451>Jewish<s%> <S%G3454>fables<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1785>commandments<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> who turn away <S%G654>from<s%> the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

To the <S%G2513>pure,<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G2513>pure;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> to those who are <S%G3392>defiled<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G571>unbelieving,<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> is <S%G2513>pure;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3563>mind<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> are <S%G3392>defiled.<s%>

They <S%G3670>profess<s%> that they <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> by their <S%G2041>works<s%> they <S%G720>deny<s%> <S%G5607>him,<s%> being <S%G947>abominable,<s%> <S%G545>disobedient,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G96>unfit<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work.<s%>
